text: Volegalea dirki is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Melongenidae, the crown conches and their allies.Bouchet, P. (2015). Volegalea dirki. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=754351 on 2015-12-02 ==Description== The maximum shell size of this species is 90 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Southern India. ==References== * Landau B. & Vermeij G.J. (2013) A new species of Pugilina (Gastropoda, Caenogastropoda, Melongeninae) from the Lower Miocene Cantaure Formation of Venezuela. Basteria 77(4-6): 89-95. ==External links== * Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Volegalea dirki
